page.title: 13RELIGION - BURGHFIELD
page.content: The church of Saint Mary the Virgin, Burghfield is a church for all the parish. The average number of people for a Sunday service is about 130. There are 27 weddings this year from April - Septmeber. On average there are 18 funerals a year. The Rector gets Â£10,000 a year some of which is deducted to pay for repairs of the church. The church cost Â£2,500 to build in 1843. In 1985 it might cost Â£300,000. The church has six church bells and a pepper pot tower. The first rector of the church, Mr Cherry, gave money to pay for the first stained glass window.
